thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Ehsan

author: Ehsan
title: Ehsan
text:
After 1 month of waiting for refund of cancelled orders:
Banggood says they have already made refund with fake transaction IDs which actually doesn't exist, I asked webmoney to check my account, they told me there is no such transactions with these IDs.
Banggood keep saying that there is problem with webmoney and refuse to send refund via webmoney transfer, I gave them my webmoney ID but they don't transfer money. Very dishonest website don't buy from them
